laboratory_examinations.findings: Normocytic anemia, neutrophilia, lymphopenia, elevated erythrocyte sedimentation rate, and elevated C-reactive protein (CRP), with a negative HLA-B27 test.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening anemia, ongoing neutrophilia, and further elevation of inflammatory markers.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive in the jejunum and serum.
